This page lists the academic publications and presentations resulting from ClimateSense.




```{r setup, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(RefManageR)
bib_file_path <- "publications.bib" 

# Check if the file exists before attempting to load
if (!file.exists(bib_file_path)) {
    stop(paste("Error: The bibliography file not found at", bib_file_path))
}

bib <- ReadBib(bib_file_path, check = TRUE)
NoCite(bib, "*")
```

```{r display, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results='asis'}
PrintBibliography(
  bib,
  .opts = list(
    style = "markdown",
    bib.style = "authoryear", 
    sorting = "ydt" 
  )
)

```
